examples.example: 他的行为总是充满了正能量，给身边的人带来了温暖和鼓励。

translate.english: His behavior is always full of positive energy, bringing warmth and encouragement to the people around him.

examples.example: 我们应该时刻注意自己的行为，保持礼貌和文明。

translate.english: We should always pay attention to our own behavior and keep polite and civilized.

examples.example: 他良好的行为习惯为大家树立了榜样。

translate.english: His good behavior habits set an example for everyone.
